mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_employees (emp_name, emp_position, cop_seq, user_seq, auth_level) VALUES (#{empName}, #{empPosition}, #{copSeq}, #{userSeq}, #{authLevel})

UPDATE tb_employees SET emp_state = #{empState}, emp_updated = #{empUpdated} WHERE emp_seq = #{empSeq}
